Hey there! This was a mini-project of mine from 2017. As you may expect, a lot of the info and links here will be outdated. I've kept the site up for archival purposes. (Contact me here)

Education Applications & Registrations

Processes, forms and resources compiled by the excellent Concierge of Brunei.

Applications

  • Education Loan / Skim Bantuan Pinjaman Pendidikan
  • Scholarship to local institutions via HECAS

Registrations

  • Exam Results via online/SMS
